title: Unable to get into a game?
body:
So after patch the new patch 6.2 came out I can no longer get into a game as the League of Legends TM Client has stopped working.
After some suggested bug fixes it seems like the error keeps on changing (from the client has stopped working to can't connect to server please check your internet to a memory error as occurred) and now when I log into my account I get a message that says "An unexpected error has occurred and a report has been sent to the server". So are there any fixes for this I have tried the majority of the Bug Splat and Game Crashes fixes.

Also will I get penalized for this? I tried playing a game of 3 v 3 Twisted Treeline and got through champ select.

Sorry for this inconvenience

Thanks 
-okysea

replies.body: Fixed. Lolreplay was a cause in the memory fault.
Thanks for letting us know how you fixed it!
